title: Impact of Aesthetic Elements in e-Learning Design on Mathematics Learning: Multimedia-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Provision of digital devices (tablets/laptops) per learner and utilization of online collaborative platforms

learning_goals: Learners can identify positive/negative aesthetic design elements in e-learning platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain over three impacts of aesthetic elements on math concept comprehension (based on quiz scores).
Learners can propose and implement aesthetic design improvements through project-based PBL activities by team
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
